thread.title: First Click: Live Photos could be Apple’s most disruptive new announcement
thread.title_full: First Click: Live Photos could be Apple’s most disruptive new announcement - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: First Click: Live Photos could be Apple’s most disruptive new announcement
text: Imagine the influence you’d wield over photography if you made the world’s most popular camera. That’s Apple with its ubiquitous iPhone. So it’s a big deal when the company introduces a new feature that’s enabled by default on every photo taken. »
